article.headline: Buffalo 79, Robert Morris 66
article.story: AMHERST N.Y. (AP) -- Yassin Idbihi had 16 points and 10 rebounds to lead Buffalo over Robert Morris 79-66 Wednesday night. Turner Battle had 14 points for Buffalo (5-3), which stretched its winning streak to five games. Mario Jordan added 13 points and Calvin Cage 11. Chaz McCrommon led Robert Morris (2-4) with 22 points, while Christopher Gooden had 16 and Aaron Thomas 11.
